subject: Economics
title: Amartya Sen: Economics as Freedom
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Amartya Sen: Economics as Freedom.

hook.text: As a child in Bengal, Sen watched three million people die in a famine.

buildup.text: Sen proved famines aren't caused by food shortages.

discovery.text: His capability approach: development isn't about GDP growth.

twist.text: No democracy with a free press has ever experienced a famine.

climax.text: Sen redefined development economics: freedom isn't the result of development. Freedom IS development.

punchline.text: Prosperity without freedom is a prison with better meals.

quiz.question: What did Sen discover about the causes of famines?
